mapper.select: select channel_id, channel_show_name, channel_show_url from dr_bi.v_dim_channel
select calendar_id title_id, date_format(calendar_date,'%m月%d日') title_name from dm_calendar where calendar_id>=20150830 and calendar_date<date(now()) order by calendar_date desc

select tm_channel.channel_id, tm_channel.channel_show_name, tm_channel.channel_show_url, tm_cus.calendar_id, coalesce(tm_cus.cust_register_num,0) cust_register_num, coalesce(tm_cus.cust_register_num_total,0) cust_register_num_total from dr_bi.v_dim_channel tm_channel left join dr_bi.dm_cust_channel_analyse tm_cus on tm_cus.channel_id = tm_channel.channel_id where tm_channel.channel_id = #{channel_id}# and tm_cus.calendar_id < '20150907' and tm_cus.calendar_id >= '20150830' group by tm_channel.channel_id, tm_channel.channel_show_name, tm_channel.channel_show_url, tm_cus.calendar_id order by tm_cus.cust_register_num_total desc, tm_cus.calendar_id desc
